AUTHOR: Redjumpman
SHORT: Can host lotteries for server users
DESCRIPTION:
Enables an admin to host lotteries.
Players will need to signup to be eligible to participate.
Includes lottery stats and a fun command for picking winners.
NAME: Lottery
INSTALL_MSG:
Thank you for installing Lottery from Jumper Cogs.
